shopifyArticle.title: Thank you to all the front line workers!
shopifyArticle.content: As our health care workers in our community continue fighting covid-19, we wanted to show our thanks by donating medical equipment, and a little something sweet! Thanks to our "Thank you" campaign, we were able to donate boxes of soaps, bath bombs, gloves, and face shields. Scarbourough General Hospital ICU Team - we appreciate all that you are doing for our great city. We hope this helps takes a little bit of stress off during these unpredictable times. We owe a great deal of credit and graditude to our frontline workers thank you for helping us show our support to them. - True frontline fighters!
shopifyArticle.contentHtml:
As our health care workers in our community continue fighting covid-19, we wanted to show our thanks by donating medical equipment, and a little something sweet!

Thanks to our "Thank you" campaign, we were able to donate boxes of soaps, bath bombs, gloves, and face shields. 

Scarbourough General Hospital ICU Team - we appreciate all that you are doing for our great city. We hope this helps takes a little bit of stress off during these unpredictable times. 

We owe a great deal of credit and graditude to our frontline workers thank you for helping us show our support to them.

-

True frontline fighters!
shopifyArticle.excerpt: As Doctors and nurses in our communities have been tirelessly working treating mostly COVID patients we decided to help support and make their days a little bit less stressful. With a little help from you our customers we donated soaps, bath bombs, gloves and face shields to a hospital ICU team.
